output_list.description: Integer overflow in distribute function allows an attacker to set any user's balance.
MintToken function allows owner to increase supply arbitrarily, causing a devaluation of the token.
claimThrone function uses a pseudo-random number generator, allowing attackers to always win the lottery.
ToOwner function allows attackers to take ownership of the contract, allowing them to steal all funds.
claimThrone function uses a pseudo-random number generator, allowing attackers to always win the lottery.
